posts.post_content:
Whenever i see this card i shortly think of it as part of the [Rock](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=5648)-[Paper](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=5705)-[Scissors](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=5698) Cycle from Unglued.  
Talking about printings, looks like this cat would never have become printed at all without these cards.

posts.post_content:
Oh, this is great! We should make versions for all blocks that get pacified by the major mechanics!  
Zendikar-Cannot attack or block if there is a land of the field.  
Innistrad- Cannot attack or block if there is a card in the graveyard  
Shadowmoor- Cannot attack or block if there is a colored permanent on the field.  
Core-Cannot attack or block if there is reminder text anywhere. Combos with [Duh](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Duh)
